comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: I think this is the bend in Google Street View - maps.google.com.au/maps?ie=UTF8&hq=&hnear=Sydney+... . I bet on 1900 and John Degotardi Jnr as the photographer - see the excellent composition, use of light and perspectives. There are other Wombeyan Caves Road photos in the series 4481. See also [http://www.flickr.com/photos/state-records-nsw/4753617374/]

comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] It does look similar, such a great use of Google to get the 'now' and 'then' street view. 

AB

comment._content: Interesting coincidence - I spent quite a while a few weeks ago trying to do the same thing in the pic posted by beachcomber - unsuccessfully, unfortunately.....

comment._content: beachcomber - I don't know whether the streetview data has now been updated, but the tunnel is at maps.google.com.au/maps?q=wombeyan+caves&ll=-34.34452...
